#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

int main() {
	vector<ll> vi;
	ll T,N,i,j;
	cin >> T ;
	ll t = 0;
	while(T--){
		t++;
		vi.clear();
		ll sum = 0;
		cin >> N ;
		for(i = 0 ; i < N ; i++){
			ll num;
			cin >> num;
			vi.push_back(num);
		} 
		sort(vi.begin(),vi.end(),greater<ll>());
		for(i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++)
			sum += vi[i];
		cout << "Case "<<t<<": ";
		cout << sum << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
